entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inline expression in attributes #75367

Closed

  • Gracefully handle incomplete property setter in object initializer #74348
    Backlog
  • Build host should localize message output #74902
  • Possibly unexpected error when a ref field is passed as an argument #75082
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix suggestions for dotted constant patterns in Color Color case #75373
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fixing the OOM in scripting #75372
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Fix circularity issue with binding const local #75371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add keyboard shortcut for 'Add null checks' in generate constructor #75370
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Support unbound generic types in 'nameof' operator. #75368
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid cycles in constant initializer #75366
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Visit collection expression elements as r-values in NullableWalker #75365
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #75369
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Don't update xaml tool #75348
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid linking back to the original TreeSource in document state updates if the associated lazy is already completed #75355
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • LSP hover responses escape backticks within inline code #75364
    VSCode, Next
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add required `--locale` option to BuildHost #74910
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update status for `field` keyword feature #75356
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Make the types in CSharp Features sealed #75352
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2551591 #75361
    auto-merge
  • Log and report NFW when we fail to apply project system update #75362
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix crash with Dispose method with params #75305
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations during typing #75351
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations and UI thread CPU costs in WithDoNotCreateCreationPolicy #75358
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Allow accessing ref fields through rvalues #75316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use primary constructor in rename command handler #75336
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75363
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75359
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75360
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Convert more lambda rude edits to runtime rude edits #75285
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, 17.13
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Fix assignment analysis of ref fields #75340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable OverflowOnFluentCall_ExtensionMethods test #75357
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Change commit to async when enter is pressed #75335
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge `main` into `features/FirstClassSpan` #75077
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Do not use overload resolution while lowering interpolated strings #75341
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75346
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode
  • Remove LittleEndian asserts #75159
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
